snippet: The parent company of T-Mobile USA agreed to buy MetroPCS on Wednesday as the cellphone providers looked to compete with bigger rivals.
abstract: The parent company of T-Mobile USA agreed to buy MetroPCS on Wednesday as the cellphone providers looked to compete with bigger rivals.
lead_paragraph: The parent company of T-Mobile USA agreed to buy MetroPCS on Wednesday as the cellphone providers looked to compete with bigger rivals. Read more »
